TECHNIQUE.name: Enforce a file content
TECHNIQUE.DESCRIPTION: Checks if a file matches a given content and if not, updates it

INPUT.NAME: GENERIC_FILE_CONTENT_PATH
INPUT.DESCRIPTION: Path or file name

INPUT.NAME: GENERIC_FILE_CONTENT_ENFORCE
INPUT.DESCRIPTION: Enforce the content of the file
INPUT.LONGDESCRIPTION: If yes, the file will exactly contains what is in the "Content of the file" field, otherwise the content will be added, leaving the rest of the file untouched

INPUT.NAME: GENERIC_FILE_CONTENT_DELETION_BOOLEAN
INPUT.DESCRIPTION: Enable the deletion of lines using a regexp

INPUT.NAME: GENERIC_FILE_CONTENT_CREATE_BOOLEAN
INPUT.DESCRIPTION: Enable the creation of the file if it doesn't exist

INPUT.NAME: GENERIC_FILE_CONTENT_ENFORCE_CREATE_ONLY_BOOLEAN
INPUT.DESCRIPTION: Enforce the content of the file only at creation
INPUT.LONGDESCRIPTION: If true, the file will be created if it doesn't exist, and only then. If the file already exists, it will be left untouched.

INPUT.NAME: GENERIC_FILE_CONTENT_MODIFICATION_BOOLEAN
INPUT.DESCRIPTION: Enable the replacement of lines using a regexp

INPUT.NAME: GENERIC_FILE_CONTENT_PAYLOAD
INPUT.DESCRIPTION: Content of the file
INPUT.LONGDESCRIPTION: Be careful to escape double quotes in the text you are entering, as this Technique does not support automatic escaping yet. Example: use \"hello\" instead of "hello"

INPUT.NAME: GENERIC_FILE_CONTENT_DELETION_REGEXP
INPUT.DESCRIPTION: Regular expression
INPUT.LONGDESCRIPTION: Regular expression used to match a line to be deleted

INPUT.NAME: GENERIC_FILE_CONTENT_MODIFICATION_REGEXP
INPUT.DESCRIPTION: Regular expression
INPUT.LONGDESCRIPTION: Regular expression used to match a line to be replaced

INPUT.NAME: GENERIC_FILE_CONTENT_MODIFICATION_DESTINATION
INPUT.DESCRIPTION: String used as a replacement

INPUT.NAME: GENERIC_FILE_CONTENT_SECTION_MANAGEMENT
INPUT.DESCRIPTION: Enforce the content of a section in the file
INPUT.LONGDESCRIPTION: Match a portion of the file between two lines (header/footer) and enforce the content between those lines. If they don't exist, the whole section will be added at the end of the file.

INPUT.NAME: GENERIC_FILE_SECTION_HEADER
INPUT.DESCRIPTION: Header of the section to enforce
INPUT.LONGDESCRIPTION: First line of the section to enforce content in. If not found, this line and the section content will be added at the end of the file. If left empty, no sections will be edited.

INPUT.NAME: GENERIC_FILE_SECTION_CONTENT
INPUT.DESCRIPTION: Content of the section
INPUT.LONGDESCRIPTION: The exact content of the section (without the header and footer).

INPUT.NAME: GENERIC_FILE_SECTION_FOOTER
INPUT.DESCRIPTION: Footer of the section to enforce
INPUT.LONGDESCRIPTION: Last line of the section to enforce content in. If not found, this line and the section content will be added at the end of the file. If left empty, no sections will be edited.

INPUT.NAME: GENERIC_FILE_CONTENT_PERMISSION_ADJUSTMENT
INPUT.DESCRIPTION: Set explicit permissions to apply on the file

INPUT.NAME: GENERIC_FILE_CONTENT_OWNER
INPUT.DESCRIPTION: Owner of the file

INPUT.NAME: GENERIC_FILE_CONTENT_GROUP
INPUT.DESCRIPTION: Group of the file

INPUT.NAME: GENERIC_FILE_CONTENT_PERM
INPUT.DESCRIPTION: Permissions to apply on the file

INPUT.NAME: GENERIC_FILE_CONTENT_POST_HOOK_RUN
INPUT.DESCRIPTION: Should the command(s) below be run if any modifications are made on the path above?

INPUT.NAME: GENERIC_FILE_CONTENT_POST_HOOK_COMMAND
INPUT.DESCRIPTION: Command to run after any modifications
